title: Matataki No Ao Wo Tadotte
alternative_title: またたきの青をたどって ; 觸及閃爍之青 ; Follow the Twinkling Blue of the Stars
status: またたきの青をたどって ; 觸及閃爍之青 ; Follow the Twinkling Blue of the Stars
description:
Description :
        One day, Tsukimachi Yamato—who dreamed of becoming a teacher since high school—comes across a familiar name on his class roster: Komiya Isshin, the name of his best friend who fell into a coma during their senior year. Isshin states that he woke up two years ago, did his rehabilitation, and transferred into the class to get a restart on his high school life. After this dreamlike reunion, though now as teacher and student, the two decide to go through their bucket list of things they weren't able to do before they graduated.
